duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop actionable insights through quantitative analysis and industry knowledge to contribute towards tactical and strategic efforts.
Develop and activate both tactical and custom digital recommendations to meet clients' goals.
Guide and mentor the development of Associate(s), guiding them through the fundamentals of the planning process.
Function independently, maintaining the workflow of planning, execution, and stewardship of campaigns.
Analyze and act on marketing data to optimize campaign performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
